entries.quest_location_d: 'Over 70% of Ord Mantell's surface is covered with pink clouds, masking the resplendence of city lights and the yellow soil of Ord Mantell's landmass.'
entries.title: Car'das Fleet: The Black Sun's Return
entries.title_d: 'With a blaring ring of clarity, the Black Sun have sprung into action, attacking a Car'das check point with an unmerciless ferocity. I have to help them! Aleas Rans'ery has entrusted me with the safety of her men. I have to prove myself. The Black Sun will surely fall! I should return to Aleas after I have completed my mission.'
